reviews.customers_say: Customers find these pajamas comfortable, soft with a buttery smooth feel, and appreciate their high-end quality and appearance, with one customer noting the sexy split leg design. The fabric receives positive feedback for keeping customers cooler than other pajamas and being perfect for summer heat waves, while the fit is loose and the size runs true to regular measurements.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and buttery smooth!!!
items.body: These are so incredibly soft. They also are nice and loose so they are comfortable to wear at night in bed. I don’t like short shorts that have elastic because I find that uncomfortable to sleep in. These have a little bit elastic but they’re so soft that nothing feels tight around my waist. They’re very light so they’re perfect for summer nights. These stayed incredibly soft even after I washed them. Wash on delicate dry on delicate and they will continue to stay extremely soft. They are a bit oversize so I sized down. For reference I am 5’5 and 120 pounds. I typically only wear SKIMS sleepwear because it’s very soft but this was a fraction of the price and just as better. Read more
items.author: Candy K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars MUST BUY!
items.body: This pajama shorts set is my ultimate best find on Amazon! The quality is spectacular and can be trusted blindly. Very comfortable and chic, incredible colors just as they appear on the website. I went ahead and bought two more of these. I've been investing in bamboo fabrics for sleepwear since a year and it's incredible! It's the best kind of fabric for softness, regulates body temperature during sleep and is long lasting. Read more
items.author: Taruna Jaipal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and great.
items.body: My wife loves this and it fits perfect and is very soft and comfortable. Great value. Read more
items.author: TJackson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pajamas ever
items.body: These are the best pajamas ever!!!! Super comfortable fit and the fabric is smooth and flows so nicely. They’re cute and comfortable while also being a little sexy with the shorts being open on the sides. Love these so much! Read more
items.author: Lisa santos

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable!
items.body: These pajamas are so soft and comfortable! Perfect for warm summer nights or if you're like me and sleep warm. I originally ordered a medium but they were just too big so downsized. I'm 5'2, 158lbs for reference. I'd give them 5 stars except for the fact that the slits on the shorts aren't sewn shut so it will easily show your underwear if you're seated. Not a big deal as I don't plan to wear these around anyone outside my household! Read more
items.author: GranolaGirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfortable- Runs big.
items.body: Very cute. Comfortable. Soft material. They do run big I'd say. I'd size down or if between sizes, size down. I wish I had bought a size down but I went with what Amazon recommended. Read more
items.author: NicKatsMom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite PJs
items.body: These are my favorite PJs. They are super soft and flowy. The fit is great. They are sexy due to the split leg. They wash and dry well, coming out softer than they first arrived. They didn’t shrink and the material doesn’t bead up and become rough. I highly recommend these. I have them in black and pink. I was worried the pink might be see through, but I don’t think it is. You will not regret purchasing these. I ordered a large and it fit perfect. 5’7”, 175 lbs, 36D. Read more
items.author: JennyB

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Revealing
items.body: Comfortable, but the shorts are very revealing. The side slits don’t leave much to the imagination…. Read more
items.author: snapdragon

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: C-camel, A-pale Purple, D-pg Tie-dye, H-teal Blue, L-pink, A-dark Purple, D-light Blue, I-dark Purple, A-dark Heather Grey, C-navy Stars, A-teal Blue, J-dark Purple, N-green, O-navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
